name: Patterns
description: A list of all the patterns I've discovered, as well as what they do.

pages.title: Dictionary Iotas
text:
Dictionary are a type of iota added by HexTweaks, similar to a portable akashic record although limited to 32 indexes,
the type key indicates any type except dictionaries or list
(as they cannot be used as keys)
Pushes a new empty dictionary to the stack
pages.name: Clerk's Vacant Reflection

text: Adds the key/value pair to the dictionary (dictionary remains on stack)
pages.name: Clerk's Integration Exaltation

text: Gets the value from the dictionary using key (dictionary remains on stack)
pages.name: Clerk's Surgeon's Exaltation

text: Removes a key from the dictionary (dictionary remains on stack)
pages.name: Clerk's Excisor's Distillation

text: Turns the spellbook that your are holding one page to the right
pages.name: Progress Gambit

text: Turns the spellbook that your are holding one page to the left
pages.name: Regress Gambit

text: Takes a number and returns all number 0 to n-1
pages.name: Iterators Purification
